divs: Sighting DetailsAlso viewed by friend in Broward County from "high" in the sky to beyond her horizion. Broward County City Tamarac apx 35 miles from me in Palm Beach at the same time. Mine view was colored by the atmosphere as hers was not. 1. Me..sitting on portch with my cat..friend walking her dog...we r both early risers. 2. bright light out of nowhere...I am alsays looking at the sky. 3. Wow!!!! What was that? No sound. If it came through clouds...no other clouds were visible...it was traveling in s direction other than the light was shining...not a helocopter...not a plane...the biggest and the brightest shooting star I have ever seen!
Summary: Bright "shooting star" in southern sky falling at a 30 degree angle beyond my horizion.
